column4: I have a friend on the line and the dsl net connection has stopped working... modem lights are blinking (properly ?)... ifconfig shows eth0 is up... ping shows "host unreachable"... assuming verizon problem... some other thing to check before getting on the horn to verizon
i've seen that exact same problem on my cable modem when they were having a problem at my isp. usually recovers after  10 minutes or so. i always figured they had to reboot a router or something :)
